mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_birth, mem_tel, mem_email, mem_gender, make_date) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_tel}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_gender}, #{make_date})
